fieldUpdates.description: Update Current Address from Mailing Address
fieldUpdates.formula: IF(NOT(ISBLANK(MailingStreet)), MailingStreet + BR(), NULL) + IF(NOT(ISBLANK(MailingCity)), MailingCity + BR(), NULL) + IF(NOT(ISBLANK(MailingState)), MailingState, NULL) + IF(NOT(ISBLANK(MailingPostalCode)), ", " + MailingPostalCode + BR(), NULL) + IF(NOT(ISBLANK(MailingCountry)), MailingCountry, NULL)
fieldUpdates.name: CurrentAddressFromMailingAddress

fieldUpdates.description: Update Current Address from Other Address
fieldUpdates.formula: IF(NOT(ISBLANK(OtherStreet)), OtherStreet + BR(), NULL) + IF(NOT(ISBLANK(OtherCity)), OtherCity + BR(), NULL) + IF(NOT(ISBLANK(OtherState)), OtherState, NULL) + IF(NOT(ISBLANK(OtherPostalCode)), ", " + OtherPostalCode + BR(), NULL) + IF(NOT(ISBLANK(OtherCountry)), OtherCountry, NULL)
fieldUpdates.name: CurrentAddressFromOtherAddress

fieldUpdates.description: Update Current Address Line 2 from Other Address Line 2
fieldUpdates.name: CurrentAddressLine2FromOtherLine2

fieldUpdates.description: Update Current City from Mailing City
fieldUpdates.name: CurrentCityFromMailingCity

Contact.PreferredEmail

fieldUpdates.description: Populates the standard Phone field displayed on activities based on the Preferred Phone field value.
fieldUpdates.formula: CASE( npe01__PreferredPhone__c , "Work", npe01__WorkPhone__c , "Home", HomePhone, "Mobile", MobilePhone, "Other", OtherPhone, If(LEN( npe01__WorkPhone__c )>0 , npe01__WorkPhone__c , if(LEN( HomePhone)>0, HomePhone, if(LEN( MobilePhone)>0, MobilePhone, OtherPhone ))))
fieldUpdates.name: Contact.PreferredPhone

fieldUpdates.description: FOR USE WITH HOUSEHOLDS. Populates the standard Phone field displayed on activities based on the Preferred Phone field value.
fieldUpdates.formula: CASE( npe01__PreferredPhone__c , "Work", npe01__WorkPhone__c , "Household", npo02__Formula_HouseholdPhone__c , "Home", HomePhone, "Personal", HomePhone, "Mobile", MobilePhone, "Other", OtherPhone, If(LEN( npe01__WorkPhone__c )>0 , npe01__WorkPhone__c , if(LEN( HomePhone)>0, HomePhone, if(LEN( MobilePhone)>0, MobilePhone, OtherPhone ))))
fieldUpdates.name: Contact.PreferredPhone_WithHousehold

rules.description: Clear Contact updated date if approval process has not been started
If Mailing is selected as the Active address, the Current Address will be populated with the Mailing Address
If Other is selected as the Active address, the Current Address will be populated with the Other Address
A contact has updated its housing allowance values
Make Estate/Trust
changes a contact's record type to PFCC employee if true
Make PFCC NonEmployee

rules.fullName: Potential Fraud Alert inform Contact owner
rules.description: Potential Fraud Alert detected inform Contact owner
Potential Fraud Cleared by
Potential Fraud Verified by

If the standard Email field is newly entered or changed AND the Preferred Email picklist is set to Alternate THEN Salesforce will fill in the Alternate Email field with the email address entered in the standard Email field.
rules.formula: AND( ISPICKVAL( npe01__Preferred_Email__c ,"Alternate"), OR( AND( ISNEW(), LEN(Email)>0 ), ISCHANGED( Email ) ) )

rules.description: If the standard Email field is newly entered or changed AND the Preferred Email picklist is set to Personal or Home THEN Salesforce will fill in the Personal Email field with the email address entered in the standard Email field.
rules.formula: AND( OR( ISPICKVAL( npe01__Preferred_Email__c ,"Personal"),ISPICKVAL( npe01__Preferred_Email__c ,"Home")), OR( AND( ISNEW(), LEN(Email)>0 ), ISCHANGED( Email ) ) )

rules.description: If the standard Email field is newly entered or changed AND the Preferred Email picklist is set to Work THEN Salesforce will fill in the Work Email field with the email address entered in the standard Email field.
rules.formula: AND( ISPICKVAL( npe01__Preferred_Email__c ,"Work"), OR( AND( ISNEW(), LEN(Email)>0 ), ISCHANGED( Email ) ) )

rules.description: If the standard Phone field is newly entered or changed AND the Preferred Phone picklist is set to Home THEN Salesforce will fill in the Home Phone field with the phone number entered in the standard Phone field.
rules.formula: AND( ISPICKVAL( npe01__PreferredPhone__c ,"Home"), OR( AND( ISNEW(), LEN(Phone)>0 ), ISCHANGED( Phone ) ) )

rules.description: If the standard Phone field is newly entered or changed AND the Preferred Phone picklist is set to Mobile THEN Salesforce will fill in the Mobile Phone field with the phone number entered in the standard Phone field.
rules.formula: AND( ISPICKVAL( npe01__PreferredPhone__c ,"Mobile"), OR( AND( ISNEW(), LEN(Phone)>0 ), ISCHANGED( Phone ) ) )

rules.description: If the standard Phone field is newly entered or changed AND the Preferred Phone picklist is set to Other THEN Salesforce will fill in the Other Phone field with the phone number entered in the standard Phone field.
rules.formula: AND( ISPICKVAL( npe01__PreferredPhone__c ,"Other"), OR( AND( ISNEW(), LEN(Phone)>0 ), ISCHANGED( Phone ) ) )

rules.description: If the standard Phone field is newly entered or changed AND the Preferred Phone picklist is set to Work THEN Salesforce will fill in the Work Phone field with the phone number entered in the standard Phone field.
rules.formula: AND( ISPICKVAL( npe01__PreferredPhone__c ,"Work"), OR( AND( ISNEW(), LEN(Phone)>0 ), ISCHANGED( Phone ) ) )

rules.description: This workflow OVERWRITES the existing value in the standard Email field based on the Preferred Email field value. This rule needs to be turned on manually after an Upgrade to this package.
rules.formula: OR( LEN(Email)=0, ISCHANGED(npe01__Preferred_Email__c) , ISCHANGED(npe01__WorkEmail__c) , ISCHANGED(npe01__HomeEmail__c) , ISCHANGED(npe01__AlternateEmail__c) )

rules.description: This workflow OVERWRITES the existing value in the standard Phone field based on the Preferred Phone field value. This rule needs to be turned on manually after an Upgrade to this package.
rules.formula: OR( LEN(Phone)=0, ISCHANGED(npe01__PreferredPhone__c) , ISCHANGED(npe01__WorkPhone__c) , ISCHANGED(HomePhone) , ISCHANGED(MobilePhone) , ISCHANGED(OtherPhone) )

rules.description: If there is a value in the standard Email field AND no values in any NPSP email fields or Preferred Email, then Salesforce updates two fields: Work Email is updated with the email address in the standard Email field and Preferred Email is set to Work.

If there is a value in the standard Phone field AND no values in any NPSP phone fields or Preferred Phone, then Salesforce updates two fields: Work Phone is updated with the phone number in the standard Phone field and Preferred Phone is set to Work.
DEPRICATED: This workflow does not do anything yet.

tasks.description: This contact's housing allowance preferences have been updated through the housing allowance form.
tasks.subject: Housing Allowance Updated

tasks.description: This task will be assigned to the owner of the contact record that is a pending member to remind them to come back to update the PIN Number field once the new contact is manually created in DDI.
tasks.subject: Update Contact Record with PIN Number
